content: It's [article_or_num:1,{赠礼}] <style=Highlight>[quant_noun:1,{赠礼}]</style>! I love it! When I wear it, I can't help but twirl around with my plushies — spinning and spinning until I can't even find them... meh?
info: NPC日常赠礼回礼-情感2-12绵朵莉_赠礼回礼

content: {A想象中}And then, the clouds will carry your gift right to me. Thank you, <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>.

content: Baa-ah, it reminds me of the sky's colors. Could this flower have been blessed by the sky? I love it sooo much!

content: Baa-ah, this <style=Highlight>{赠礼}</style> reminds me of the colors of the sky... I love it~! Will I turn into a floofy little cloud if I wear it?

content: The flowers of <style=Highlight>{命中Tag}</style> have colors that remind me of clouds. Clouds blooming on the earth... I love that idea.

content: Is this <style=Highlight>{赠礼}</style>? It reminds me the colors of clouds. I love it sooo much! My heart took off the moment I opened it, like it was soaring into the sky.

content: {A喜欢}Sorry, but when I see a plushie, I just... couldn't help myself! Squish squish~ Your gift really hit me right in the softest spot in my heart.
